content.detailedDescription:
Approx 4:30am i went outside to smoke a cigarette in our back parking lot. a crisp clear morning in the city. i was observing the stars and looked directly over head to see a bright as the moon delta shaped object at about 45++ thousand feet, it come into view coming north to south over the roof of my apartment building. it was huge about the 1/5 the size of the moon or looked to be. as soon as i noticed it. it faded to black from the back end of it to the front. like blackness moving over it until it disappeared and could not be seen against the blackness off the sky.

my feelings were shock and my mouth was hanging open. then immediately i told myself.. do you know what you just saw? it only lasted a few seconds but all i can tell you is it was moving north to south, delta shaped and the the darkness covered it up from the back to the front even though it was going forward, meaning that shadow that made it disappear moved over the thing in the same direction it was moving.
content.summary: Lasted about one second. delta shaped. as bright as the moon. faded to black, the bright white detla shape faded from one the back end to the front of object.

content.detailedDescription: When i am at home, my mother called me to living room. she saw a light in sky from window. and i took light's picture. light's color is orange-yellow. it waited in sky for 2-3 minutes. then it moved to space... my english is not good but i can tell in turkish to mufon national director of turkey...
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange orange-yellow lights above the sea

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were on our roof looking at the moon and noticing the different types of ifo's.  he noticed a light moving so we thought it was a satellite, aircraft, or balloon but then it started moving backwards at an impossible speed.  it made squares, skipped (once), abrupt turns, zooming up, dropping like a leaf.  when an aircraft did seem to get closer the ufo seemed to take a second to see the aircraft but then moved away quickly and just started doing it's thing again.  the other light (way too far to be any laser) was moving around but much less
and was about two inches and a little lower than the first one.  my iphone was not equipped to see something that small that far away and basically could not be seen for a video.  the experience was super incredible and really, really hard to believe.  

it didn't affect me in a negative way because it seemed too far away to be scared.  my husband was skeptical but could not come up with reasonable explanation.  my husband is a scientist in medicine and is so darn logical that he won't really answer a question unless he is pretty sure of the answer.  since he was with me, i don't have to seem "crazy".  he is my credibility.  he is still however unconvinced of what it could possibly be which makes it a ufo.  i want to believe.
content.summary: My husband and i were on our roof looking at the moon and noticing the different types of ifo's in the night sky.  he noticed a light moving so we thought it was a satellite or balloon and suddenly it started making abrupt directional changes.  so fast it

content.detailedDescription: We had dinner at a neighbors down the street from where we live, both our kids were out playing on bristol street with their friend, on bikes, they came running to get us to show us the red orange orbs in the sky, a neighbor down the road said she was watching it too, i only saw the end of it taking off into the sky at a rapid speed but they saw hovering, patterns of moving back and forth, when i told neighbors across the street they had seen the same thing a year ago and same description and movements, our one son does not believe in ufo's so it was odd that now he does know they real from this incident, it made no sounds at all, was very big in size, glowing and blinking off and on. after i researched that these red and orange orbs are seen all over the united states and the world.
content.summary: Red orange glowing orb hovering over trees and observed by 3 children and neighbor, no sound, made eradicate turns and fast disappearing into the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work when a bright object sped past at a very fast speed, maybe 100-200 feet over the tree line, headed in a straight line tword the west, it was completely silent.
content.summary: Large, low light moving very fast in straight line tword west

content.detailedDescription:
It append at pourvoirie scott a fishing resort in very remote place i can tel you the exact location on the map if you want.I whorked at this place to and fished there for 20 years, lots of persons and personel incuding me have seen strange lights in the sky and over top of trees at this place summer and winter to.But 
me my mother girlfriend and my 2 dogs are at this wedge lake remote just by 4x4 and only one cottage at this lake. we fish and there is and island in the midle of this triangular shaped lake. we go there to have less bugs an swim its all sand its 70 feet by 150 feet.As we were walking on the island and we see some rectangular shaped hole in the sand about 10 inches by20 inches and the vegetation aroud it is burned even litle trees and its perfet rectangular about 4 incn deep in the sand, there are 2 like this but could be a third one in water.Nothing can go on this island and make these kind perfect rectangular burned around holes.We are scared a bit but we were mulder fans and my girlfriend started to film in the sky over us, dogs started to act strange like there were lookig at someting that was mouving. it ends like this, we are back home and look at the video and there was at some point strange noise like tik tik eeeeee and we slow the camera and when the noise came we could see this can shape vessel over us in the sky and it came 4 or 5 times, called my mother come quik and showed her the video and she could not belive it we decided not tell anybody.I have to tell there is only one hole about 40 feet deep in the lake and the rest is 8 to 20 feet, this hole is right beside the island i can see it with my sonar looks like they diged the hole and made this island the hole is very proportional to the island, and the germans have all the mining claims on this territory and its all uranium under.
and about 0ne week after,with a bright flash before i saw one greys 2 times comming in my room to scare me, was i dreaming or what? then no more video in the cumputer lost everything in it, ad to re install windows after, very strange, i had other things appened after fishing there, before with other girl we saw stange lights in the sky and told her it appens very often here not to worry and after we got home and in the bed i could see her bone like an x ray vision it lasted 3 or 4 minutes, did not tell her. i just saw on hangar1 the trucker ad the same vision. wow wy me. i think they go there to mine or get some water or cool down there vessel but they go there all the time. could bring you at this place.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was shaped like a can of beer. cylynder with a aura around it

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a night watchman in central scotland, near the ochil hills,and i looked up and seen a massive ship, rectangular in appearance, it was pure black or dark if you hadnt looked at it more than once you would have thought it was a cloud until you looked at it more closely, you could see windows, docking stations. it was massive but moved very slowly without any sound. as i said it could have passed as a cloud if you never looked at it more closely. i watched it fly right over me towards the ochil hills n/e and went right over them very slowly. it did not change direction or speed and drifted silently over the hills. it had windows and bay doors but they were kind of blurry hence saying it could have been mistaken for being a funny looking cloud.
content.summary: A slow moving large object, dark moving slowly and silently

content.detailedDescription: Standing at kitchen window at 6:24 am and saw a mint green glowing ball speeding through the sky from north to south over the bay area (oakland) it had fuzzy edges and was extremely fast and as soon as i noticed for a couple of seconds it was gone. it was on a straight path going south and then vanished into thin air. there must have been aircraft in the area because this is a heavy air traffic zone, but i didn't notice any at the time. maybe it was a meteor. the moon is very full and out this morning. perhaps this indicates an earthquake is coming.
content.summary: A mint green glowing ball speeding through sky over bay area from north to south then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
It was an oval object,  appeared from nowhere,  moving in a straight line,  it disappeared and reappeared a few meters back, a few seconds later disappeared in a flicker. 

i saw two people when we watched the stars and we both found it very weird.
the movement, disappearance and re- appear meters behind we turned to us very strange.
content.summary: Oval object,it was dark gray.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My wife and 6 year old grandaughter were in the hot tub viewing the stars on a clear cold night. time approximately 19.00 hrs. my wife was pointing to a particularly attractive section of sky and asking my grandaughter could she see the stars, she replied "yes" as they looked this thing began to fill their field of view. it came from directly over their heads and was heading north, my wife described it as huge, "as big as that wall" she said to me later when we were outside at the tub, she was pointing to a 13 ft wall!! my wife, who was 60 yaers old at the time described a long bullet shaped object very dark and no lights or features, the sky around the object "wobbled" "like the wake from a boat" or "when heat makes the road appear to wobble" my grandaughter saw something else, she saw the craft as "goldie, brownie, black" object and it "sparkled everywhere, then was gone" she turned to my wife and asked to go inside because she was frightened. when they came inside i asked my grandaughter what shape the object was and she pointed to our tall surround sound black cylinder tv speakers "it was that shape" she said. i asked her to draw me a picture and she included the sparkles, which appeared everywhere over the hull of the craft an instant before the craft disappeared. these sparkles were not bright, my wife's sixty year old eye's did not notice them, "they were tiny gold sparkles" said my grandaughter. we live on the edge of town with only one house between us and the countryside, the object was travelling toward town and in the general direction of liverpool. could the hot tub have played a part in this apparition i asked my wife? she shook her head and said "no way" my daughter and son in law live with their two girls in an odd old house, streaks of light, orbs of light and dark shadows have been viewed by all members of the family at the same time. the streaks of light have been witnessed entering the main bedroom from outside the house, flashing through the wall. inside that bedroom they have been seen to disappear at one particular wall/wardrobe. electo-magnetic meters detect nothing anywhere in the house until you go near this wardrobe, then they have gone off scale! it a strange world, and the government knows more about it than they are letting on! regards.
content.summary: Dreadnaught type craft appeared in section of sky they were observing.

content.detailedDescription:
02/22/2016 at 23:15 pst   i had just stepped out of the house to get something from the car when the bright light caught my eye. it was moving very slow, 15 to 30 mph. over the ocean about 8th of a mile off the pismo beach pier. i had seen it before, so i called out to my neighbor to come out and look. he's some kind of expert on aircraft, and is a retired pilot. 
    "i've seen it before", i told him. "about the same time, two or three times a week". 
     we watched it and listened intently for any engine noise that could identify it. we were startled to hear none, considering how low it was.         
     with his little binoculars. he looked at the craft while i ran about 20 feet to grab my new nikon 16x50 binoculars. they were already focused when i first laid eyes on it over the pier. the pier is 2 miles north of my location. 
     at first i thought i was out of focus, because all i could see was a super bright round sparkly orb. i checked my bino's very carefully and rest them on the rail of my deck to get a perfect still view. i drop to my knees to stabilize even more. 
     it appeared to change shape and morph into three landing lights. my neighbor, bobby, says, "what the hell is it?". i said it looked like a privet jet.   
     then i saw the red and green, port and starboard flashing wing tip markers and had a good full stable view of the craft that looked like a privet jet.
     as we watched it fly directly over my domicile, we were both totally confounded at how an aircraft of such design could possibly remain airborne flying that slow, 25 to 30mph, and that low, about 800ft with out a sound. 
     i suspect this sighting may be some kind new man made technology, only because of the regulation style marker lights. the landing lights on the leading edge of the wings had lit the fuselage which enabled me to see it was a dull battle ship gray color, with no visible id markings. 
     it could be a military drone. but still a ufo.
content.summary: Custom privet jet or drone. flys the same path a few times a week, totally silent.

content.detailedDescription: A group of my friends thought we would go for a walk through merthyr mawr and play around with our night vision cameras, so as we got to the forest just before the sand dunes, we could then hear noises coming from the forest just left se of the road. it was clicking going off for a while. at the time we were just seeing if we could just see through the forest then all as sudden i decided to get my touch out and have a look at the forest. so as i was scanning the forest i saw these glowing eyes staring at me. so the shouted at the other guys to look and they went. 2 seconds later the eyes appeared again and all 3 of us were staring at these eyes for about 5 seconds and they didn't move. they where a lot taller than us, also a little distance from us. about 200 yards away but they where pretty big. one of the gues decided to get the camera out to have a look as 2 others were keeping a close eye on these eyes. just as the guy getting the camera out it appeared from out of the clouds. this bright yellow, orange and blue object coming down through the sky and slowing into a field not far away. we all was in so much shock it scared us a little. i just thought it was a shooting star when i first saw it but it was coming down too slowly to be one, it didn't make no noise at all for it to be an aeroplane or helecopter. it was flashing all colours on the outside and you could see the spinning of the object. i was absoluty shocked to what i saw. i lost sight of it because it went and landed behind the trees. as we started walking back down the lane there were lasers getting shone on us all the time on the way home and car lights appearing from no where but no cars in sight or even being there. it was such a frightening experience but i now know there is something out there for sure.
content.summary: Merthyr mawr walk into the dark

content.detailedDescription: Test submission
content.summary: Test submission to be deleted

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the siting. i had be out of the army about a year and living back home with my mother, step father, 2 sisters and a baby brother that was a year old at the time. we were sitting, my mother, father and i in the living room, little brother a sleep in bedroom. my father was first to notice lights coming in thru the window. he stood up and said the police must be out side and said did we hear any one pull in the drive way has he was beginning to look out the window. he turned and said it was some thing in the sky hovering over the house. he went out the front door with me and mom following. at that time staying in the yard in front of the porch. i saw it. a round like craft with light pulsating going around it. it gave off a glow from the lights. it also had 3 white lights underneath. one on either side and 1 in the middle. it appeared to be about 15 to 20 feet wide and about 10 to 12 feet thick. because of the glow from the pulsating lights. i could see a clear outline of the craft. it seem to have a small dome on top. i didn't see that it had any windows and it make no sounds at all. we got about a 10 sec look at it before it hovered up in to the air and then, in a blink of an eye. it shot straight up, like a shooting star. now we could still see it when it stoped but it just looked like a star in the sky, but then another shot in from across the sky from the sw and stoped beside the one we had saw over the house, then another from the same direction has the first, se and stoped at the other 2. while we were watching this my sister and cousin pulled in bringing my sisters home and by this time my other sister at come out of her bedroom and joined us watching what i would call orbs. i hadn't noticed when the first 3 but has more came in. i noticed they were lining up next to each other making pyramid shapes, 3 orbs for each pyramid. my mother had to go in at these time to be with my little brother so dad and my sisters followed him in and my cousin left, but they had seen the orbs too but done would talk about it to people out of fear from being called crazy. i stayed out until about 4 in the morning watching these things. i did get to see 2 more a little closer has they where coming in but not has close has the first one. there had to have been almost from 100 to 200   of them. straight up from over our house but way up there. they had came in from all direction thru out the night and lined up in pyramid shapes. they weren't like perfect rows either. some rolls had more pyramids and there were 5 rolls with 7 to 10 in each roll and they didn't like make a pyramid and then make another beside it, more like when one came in it may have joined to fill a pyramid toward the middle of the roll, then another one would come in and join by itself, then later on another one would join it, it was like each orb had to line up with certain other orbs to make the pyramid. they came in like that and left like that to, but when they left. they shot away, like a shooting star. i didn't see any shot back down like toward the earth tho, they shot out into space, but coming in, some came front the ground some where and others from space, but they all left shooting out into space. i am sharing this in case some one else has seen some thing like it or that maybe some one has seen some thing else and by me telling this it helps them in some way. this was the only time i'd ever seen any thing like this and will never forget it. i doubt my family talking about it. my mother doesn't even like talking about it with me. i come from a long line of christians. to a christian these things are either demons or angels. i wish i could have videoed it, but we had no recorder and had no film for the camera, back then my parents only bought film when they knew they were going to take pictures.
content.summary: 2 ufo's up close with later formation of up to 100 to 200 orbs

content.detailedDescription: This happened when i was a kid still living with my parents. my bedroom was on the side of the house directly facing our street. my bed was situated directly across from a fairly large 3 pane window. i remember waking up out of a dead sleep and felt the urge to look out the window. i got up and went to the window and my eyes were immediately drawn to a bright red light off in the distance. it appeared to be a star except that it kept blinking, but it was not a fast blinking it was more of blink, pause 2 seconds, blink. i thought plane at first. as i watched it i saw the light blink in one area of the sky then it would pause and blink again but it would be down quite a ways from where it was , then blink and be really far to the left, or far to the right or up and then down . it was very confusing , i couldn't figure out if there was one light or many lights. this went on for 5 or so minutes. then all of the sudden the blinking red was much much closer, (at first seemed to be very high and far off in the sky) but now this light was in front of but almost the same elevation as the tops of the oak trees in our neighbors yard across the street. for whatever reason i was not thinking this was strange until the next day. okay so this same strange blinking and weird direction movements goes on for another 10 minutes or so. then it has definitely gotten closer as the blinks were happening because it is literally blinking not even 1 foot of the ground in the center of my street. ( my road is a dirt road only 3 permanent residents on the street the rest are cabins mostly unoccupied, lined densely with trees on either side)as i'm watching the light it is still blinking but now it is not all over the place it is following the exact center of the street. i remember the whole time i was struggling to figure out what the light was attached to as i could not see any type of structure it just seemed like a ball of light. i watch it continue slowly down the center of the road probably a couple hundred feet until it reached the stop sign where there is a paved road with a street light. when it reached the street light it was gone. i waited for maybe 10 more minutes for it to come back but i could no longer see it. after this i remember just thinking where did it go ? then i simply laid back in bed and went to sleep. i don't think i mentioned it to my parents until several years later. actually i think i told them after my dad had told me he woke up in the middle of the night to the master bathroom completely illuminated which at first he thought car headlights, but then realized the only two windows are a skylight and a window 8ft from the ground facing to the right which is facing another houses wall. oddly he just went back to bed.
content.summary: Looked out bedroom window around 3am saw a red light it kept blinking but slowly. every time in blinked in was heading in a new direction. the blink stopped then started again but was much closer until it was directly outside window about 1 ft off ground

content.detailedDescription: Me my wife and daughter were on holiday in south devon uk we were staying at a holiday park in paignton. returning to the caravan at about 10pm my wife entered the caravan but as the sky was very clear not a cloud and very little street lighting i asked my daughter if she would like to see a shooting star so we waited outside viewing the star sky, after about 5 minutes we saw a plane crossing the sky navigation lights clearly visible crossing west to east.As the plane was going east we saw another object going in the opposite direction almost straight past the plane glowing white with no navigation lights i thought this quite strange thinking this was a plane. within a minute i knew this was not the case the object after having past the plane made what i can only describe as a u turn immediate and almost instantly and began to follow, the turn is like nothing i have ever seen before, this tracked the plane until it disappeared into the distance. my daughter was only 5 at the time but saw exactly what i saw she was supprised that a plane could turn so fast!!!! .I have seen more before and after, lights strange objects but nothing like that, feelings yes i do believe that it is possible for life from other planets or within our own.Just one extra thing in the 1950's my mum dad and many other couples were out on a sunday afternoon walk in cardiff, my dad at the time was in british army intellegence signallers in london, my dad never believed in et,s was never one to cater for sci fi but on this afternoon my mum and dad witnessed a very bright disc come at a fantastic speed stop dead hover and disappear at the same speed away my dad had never seen anything like this or had heard of any plane or flying vehicle that was possible of this maneuver.
content.summary: Unbelievable turn and follow

content.detailedDescription: Well, it all started when i sank into my couch with a bowl and turned on history and ancient aliens. they were showing multiple ufo footage and whatnot and it all looked really real, so i thought it would be best for me to report this so y'all can look into it and possibly get to the bottom of it. personally, i'm guessing it's all a lot of sinister freemason witchcraft or whatever. who knows.
content.summary: Exciting. i wept.

content.detailedDescription: When i witniessed the ufo i was putting the bins out at my university house.  i decided to look up at the stars as it was a very clear night and they seemed particularly bright and visible on that particular night.  as i looked up i noticed what at first glance appeared to be a small grey object travelling across the sky from left to right.  as the object was emitting no light and making no sound i originally assumed that it was simply a night bird such as an owl flying relatively close to the ground.  however after watching the object curiously for a few seconds it suddenly and rapidly changed direction and made a sharp left turn, advancing rapidly.  it then made an equally sharp right turn straight after this and once again accelerated forwards rapidly once the turn was complete.  i knew then that this could not have been a bird as i have never seen any bird make such rapid turns and accelerate so quickly and effortlessly in my life.  there are planes that often fly over my house to the local airport however these are easily recognisable as planes due to their lights and the sound of the engines, the same goes for any helicopters that fly over.  these facts make me firmly believe that this object was genuinely a ufo. this was my immediate reaction when i saw the object make such seemingly impossible manoeuvres in the sky.  i lost sight of the object after 25-30 seconds as it simply seemed to disappear.
content.summary: Saw a dark circular object flying over my house at night which made no noise and could change direction rapidly

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were visiting my parents cabin in fairview michigan. the cabin is directly on perry lake. it was a couple hours past sundown approximately 9 pm we were outside on the back deck to have a cigarette.It was very dark out, the only illumination was the moon reflecting over the surface of the water. we were both facing the lake looking at the water and the stars. for reference the lake is not very big at this section, maybe a quarter of a mile to the other shore directly across from the deck we were standing on which was maybe 10 feet from the shore. so we were just standing there smoking and talking when we both noticed an unnaturally bright and large star that seemed to not be there a few seconds before.(it appeared to be in the far distance beyond and above the trees in the sky) we both at the same time said "wow look how bright that star is ..." and i said "why is it so big it looks weird" so probably 30 seconds of watching this bright star then all of the sudden its getting brighter and larger, as if its moving towards us at an extremely high rate of speed because now its as if its actually over the water, but it was hard to tell exactly how high in the sky because of how bright it was, but if i had to make an estimate i would say less than 100ft. then it just kind of hovers over the water for a couple seconds and there was a bright flash and shoots to the left and it was just gone. now we both looked at each other and said "did you see that!" afterwards my boyfriend just was indifferent but i thought it was really really strange. i was like wanting to just keep talking about it. i immediately told my parents about what we saw and my mom told me that her and my dad have been frequently seeing strange white lights over the lake. so i probably would have dismissed it had she not told me they have been seeing these lights all the time. her description matched mine except for the flight patterns were all different, but the lights seem to come from another area and hover over the water and then seemingly disappear.
content.summary: Saw a huge very bright light over lake looked like star at first was not moving then after a while it got brighter seemed to be moving towards us at fast rate then got so bright and just stopped then it was gone in an instant

content.detailedDescription:
It was a sunday afternoon about 4 or 5 o'clock in august 2007.  my son, (who was 13 years old at the tim) and i had just left the bank on the corner of sardis rd north and monroe road.  we we heading north on monroe rd when i exclaimed, g_____, look at that!  what is that?"  g. did not know either, but acknowledged that he saw it too.  i stopped the car in the right lane, and put my flashers on and we watched a very large gray disk.  it was as big as 4 two story houses, if the houses were about 2500 square feet).   the gray color was similar to "battleship gray".  the disk was vertical, as if it were a giant coin standing on it's edge.  

as we sat in the car, watching this, disk changed color!  we watched it go from gray to white, similar to the color of a cloud.  the way it changed was from the left side middle point of the diameter.  the white color flowed from this point covering the top and bottom, until there was only a "pie piece" like wedge of gray left, and then that filled in.  and it was gone, we could not see it.

we did not see it fly away, we did not hear anything, it was just a part of the white cloud.
content.summary: Driving home, my son and i saw a large gray disk hovering above the trees

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving wal-mart in mesa, as i had stopped there to pick up medicine for my sick child. i noticed 4 very bright kind of blinking round lights in the sky to the west, over the phoenix area. they would have been several miles away from where i was. there are always a lot of planes in that area, and sometimes they come into a formation to wait for landing. however, i realized almost immediately that they were too bright for airplanes, and that they were not behaving like airplanes. once in awhile one would move and kind of circle around the other 3. they did not move or behave like airplanes or stars, and the lights kind of twinkled and were very bright. it is very hard to say how big they actually were since they were so far away from where i stood. my mother and child were in the car and they also witnessed the lights, and we could see them on and off all the way home (sometimes the view was obscured by trees or buildings.) when i got home i had my fiance go outside to look and we could still see one of the lights from the front of our house. from there we could see that sometimes the light blinked red, and he agreed with me that it was really unusual and was not an airplane. because i have a sick child, i did not get any video or pictures. we did not stay outside the house looking for long, so i do not know the duration or how it "ended." i would say that from the time i left wa-mart and first saw them to when my fiance was outside with me and saw them was probably no more than a 30 min. span of time. i would really love to know if anyone else reported anything from last night over phoenix.
content.summary: 4 blinking lights over phoenix

content.detailedDescription:
I am combining 4 different sightings of what i believe are the same object into a single report from 2 separate witnesses.

sometime in october/november 2015, i was discussing ufos with a co-worker. he told me he had observed some fireballs in the local area where he lived. i didn't think much of it at the time.

1st personal sighting - in early january 2016, i observed a red/orange/yellow orb outside my house while walking across my front lawn. it was between the hours of 7pm - 8pm. it was traveling from southwest to northeast in a straight line. it made no noise and i estimate its height to be 2,500 ft. i lost sight of it as it disappeared into the dark horizon sky.

2nd personal sighting - approximately 1 week later at roughly the same time as before, i was leaving my home. i was on my front porch and looked up. again, i saw the exact same object; however, this time it was traveling for northwest to southeast. i yelled out to my wife to come see this object but by the time she arrived it had disappeared into the night horizon sky. also the neighbor's roof obstructed the view.

3rd personal sighting - again a 3rd time, i observed the same object but this time it was my place of work. i work at a local airport so i can narrow the time down. it was very close to between the hours of 4:00am - 4:15am. the exact same object was travelling in a northwest to southeast direction at roughly the same altitude as the previous 2 observations; 2,500 - 5,000 ft. i got a good long look at this object because i was walking through a pretty much empty parking lot. 

i would say roughly 30 - 45 seconds after this object passed almost overhead, a twin engine jet along the exact same flight path and very similar altitude flew over. it is my belief this jet was chasing the object. i could hear the jet, whereas, all 3 times the object was silent. this jet appeared to be a 737 or airbus 319/320; i could see both jet engines mounted underneath the wings on either side of the fuselage. i could not identify if was a commercial aircraft or military because it was almost directly overhead. also, this jet did not have it's landing lights on and if i remember correctly no navigation lights. the light pollution from this area is pretty bad but i could still and hear the twin engine jet.

if i receive a follow up from mufon regarding my 3rd observation, i will give more details on why i believe the jet was chasing the object and not a routine commercial/military flight. 

in mid february 2016, i ran into my co-worker whom i previously chatted regarding his multiple sightings of fireballs. i relayed my 3 personal observations to him and much to my surprise, he indicated my sightings seemed identical to his. when he originally told me about the fireballs, i was thinking there was a trail of fire and/or smoke behind but that was not the case. we both saw a red/orange/yellow colored round object travelling across the night sky that didn't make any noise. 

my co-worker also forwarded to me a video he made of one such sighting of this object. the object in his video is much larger than all 3 of my sightings and brighter. also the object is much lower to the horizon than in my own 3 observations. he told me the video was made on september 15, 2015.

i can't say for sure if the video shows a ufo or is an exact match of what i observed but it is fairly close.
content.summary: Observed same object 3 times

content.detailedDescription:
I am combining 4 different sightings of what i believe are the same object into a single report from 2 separate witnesses.

sometime in october/november 2015, i was discussing ufos with a co-worker. he told me he had observed some fireballs in the local area where he lived. i didn't think much of it at the time.

1st personal sighting - in early january 2016, i observed a red/orange/yellow orb outside my house while walking across my front lawn. it was between the hours of 7pm - 8pm. it was traveling from southwest to northeast in a straight line. it made no noise and i estimate its height to be 2,500 ft. i lost sight of it as it disappeared into the dark horizon sky.

2nd personal sighting - approximately 1 week later at roughly the same time as before, i was leaving my home. i was on my front porch and looked up. again, i saw the exact same object; however, this time it was traveling for northwest to southeast. i yelled out to my wife to come see this object but by the time she arrived it had disappeared into the night horizon sky. also the neighbor's roof obstructed the view.

3rd personal sighting - again a 3rd time, i observed the same object but this time it was my place of work. i work at a local airport so i can narrow the time down. it was very close to between the hours of 4:00am - 4:15am. the exact same object was travelling in a northwest to southeast direction at roughly the same altitude as the previous 2 observations; 2,500 - 5,000 ft. i got a good long look at this object because i was walking through a pretty much empty parking lot. 

i would say roughly 30 - 45 seconds after this object passed almost overhead, a twin engine jet along the exact same flight path and very similar altitude flew over. it is my belief this jet was chasing the object. i could hear the jet, whereas, all 3 times the object was silent. this jet appeared to be a 737 or airbus 319/320; i could see both jet engines mounted underneath the wings on either side of the fuselage. i could not identify if was a commercial aircraft or military because it was almost directly overhead. also, this jet did not have it's landing lights on and if i remember correctly no navigation lights. the light pollution from this area is pretty bad but i could still and hear the twin engine jet.

if i receive a follow up from mufon regarding my 3rd observation, i will give more details on why i believe the jet was chasing the object and not a routine commercial/military flight. 

in mid february 2016, i ran into my co-worker whom i previously chatted regarding his multiple sightings of fireballs. i relayed my 3 personal observations to him and much to my surprise, he indicated my sightings seemed identical to his. when he originally told me about the fireballs, i was thinking there was a trail of fire and/or smoke behind but that was not the case. we both saw a red/orange/yellow colored round object travelling across the night sky that didn't make any noise. 

my co-worker also forwarded to me a video he made of one such sighting of this object. the object in his video is much larger than all 3 of my sightings and brighter. also the object is much lower to the horizon than in my own 3 observations. he told me the video was made on september 15, 2015.

i can't say for sure if the video shows a ufo or is an exact match of what i observed but it is fairly close.
content.summary: Observed same object 3 times

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home when i hearde a huge noise and after that there was an earthquake.
all of us, my family and my neigtbours felt it.
it came from the boundarie with north korea. the police didn't tall us anythink although we ask them.

content.detailedDescription:
Thirty years ago, working at night at an oil refinery in betim (mg), to get close to a fuel tank, would have to do sampling and measurement in this tank. it was when i saw an object without indefinitely, strong alarnajada color from east to northwest. for me esle would be two thousand meters or lower, normal speed of an airplane. i climbed the steps of the tank quickly to be able to see it from the top of this tank. he has been decreasing due to be moving away, when from under him suddenly, he released another object that came flashing lighter color than the first. this object that tore up came flashing to stop falling and was gradually decreasing their light intensity, or may be initiated at high speed because i was losing sight due to distance.
the first object, changed its course to the north and could tell he disappeared gradually until disappears because my vision no longer reach.
this whole event from the moment i saw until ending, seven or ten minutes.
content.summary: Objeto desconhecido, luz laranja, velocidade baixa, ejetou outro objeto

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Walking south returning from a store, noticed two glowing lights about tge size of a penny at arms length hovering about 5 degrees apart from eachother.   after a minute of little movement one light moved quickly to the north (now south west of me) and then paused before moving up into and behind cloud cover.

the second light held position dimmed for a moment, then glowed more brightly and shot up above the clouds like a firework might. (no explosion or noise)

a few minutes later i am moving east towards my home and i see two lights identical to before rising rapidly in the distance south east of me. about 20 degrees separation between the two, each about an asprin in size arm length.

at this point i reached for my smart phone to take video or pics, but find my phone does not have power. i race to bring my fiaance outs from inside and her first thought is a planet, but its moving, a neighbor across the street comes out and is stunned, she gets a friend from her home and they also begin watching the lights.

one neighbor suspects a drone until again the lights ascend very rapidly
then pause hovering, changing directions several times.

it was very silent and none of us heard noise. the lights grew closer and larger to penny size then again paused before darting up behind the clouds one after the other.

my neighbor said she saw a third light to the north but i did not see it myself.

there is an air force base within 10 miles south and we live less then 10 miles south of the space center, just next to port canaveral.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange red globes hover then rapidly change direction and altitude

content.detailedDescription:
I had gotten up at midnight, and as always, before returning to bed, i looked up at the clear night sky. (have seen ufo's once before). the object was immediately noticeable as it was very bright and much larger than surrounding stars. unmagnified,it looked like an orb, but was not golden the way the ones i'd seen before had looked. the light was white. no blinking or pulsing. i got my cell phone, set it to camera, put it on telephoto, and snapped a couple of shots. even seeing the results on the camera was surprising, in that the shape was un orb like, with a sort of notch out of it and black forms on the surface. i thought of the space station, decided to reserve judgment till morning. the object got smaller and farther away as i watched. i gave up and went to bed.  
got up and almost immediately uploaded images. i use zoner photo program, which is pretty good. first i enlarged it, which accentuated the odd shape. and then i enhanced the contours, which really blew my mind.
content.summary: Observed orb many times larger than stars over home. it moved slowly, then hovered, then moved again.

content.detailedDescription:
The algarve portugal sigtning was a clear ufo. i am using aviation phrases to describe conditions, i am flying for more than 15 years. 

object: 
no noise, no directional change, straight line path flying over the coastline on approx. track 270 magnetic course. the sun at the day in early september was shining bright conditions cavok. from the side where the sun lighted the object it was white and had a shape like a katana microplane (the school 2 seater) but was built up in 2 levels. on the backside there raged out a hockey stick like aileron which was not moving. 

position & ground speed: 
the object was flying direction west parrallel to the the eastwards right hand upwind of fao airport (the usual commercial outbound) routing. this means against the direction of commercial traffic and a bit above the route. the object was moving with appros 250 kts steadily. as i ran behind the next building to follow it up it was out of my sight at approx. 60 degrees angle from horizon directly over the city center of quarteira, portugal direction albufeira.

conclusion: 
we have a small house in the area which i am visiting since 25 years. in this time there i have never whitnessed such an object flying in the area. also there was sure no educated pilot in charge, because flying an object in a departure area of an intl. airport would be suicidal...
content.summary: Object flown straight line overhead, approx. 8 miles from fao airport. i am a pilot therefore i know it wasnt an aircraft known by authorities. neither it was a commercial aircraft. i saw the object viewing the sky lying at the pool
content.locationName: San Vicente de la Barquera, Cantabria

content.detailedDescription:
I was running from the secret service (men in black) problems at fort knox or maybe the big p. not sure but i was racing faster through a field when a very disturbing loud screeching noise hovered above me. a flashlight came down surrounding me. i was paralized looking down at the grass. it faded to black as i passed out.

when i woke im not dumb as i knew i was in a metal room with strange built in luminating lighting in the ceiling. i did realize a presence and a deep telekinetic voice entered my head saying how surprised they are to learn that im able to withstand the amount of pressure surrounding me whilst moving at great speed through space.

anyway he assured me no harm and said no we do not eat your kind as we dont have mouths, only eyes and nostrils. he told me it is safe to get up and stand. oh boy it was like being on the gravatron machine or even pluto. i had to heave my body to my side and force myself off the unit bed to stand up. you can look at me he said and said it will take time to walk properly and then i looked and for the very first time in this lifetime, i observed a tall creature man. most definately scary but assured me again there is no danger and that he already knew i had a 1001 questions including god.He was so skinny-thin with long arms and two and a half fingers. two small nostrils almost built in with no mouth

he said to follow him towards the captains room,but not to touch the walls like star trek and there was another they are the same. anyway to cut a two year journey short it was so amazing and they taught me so much on our endeavor throughout a colorful and full of light journey with
places in space and other areas with planets and landing spots. i learned to drive but not land or take off at least i was privileged to navigate through space at a speed and directions too fast to understand. and i earned my stay as a worthy friend and operator.

coming home:
on my return i never forgot that day my good friends and only family companions said it would be sad how they can not interfere with the nature of human relations as i was lucky.
we landed and i did not want to leave them but that was my gift from them plus i was kinda homesick. i walked through the door so happy very very happy to see my family and you know what? they were looking like they saw a ghost i was wondering what they were looking at? then there was silence...And they all started at the same time is it you? is that really you? we thought you were dead! 

. okay now that sideways look.

they found it very extremely hard believe me but you know what i found to be extremely harder?

they said i was gone for a long time
yes i was presumed long gone
and you know what i mean?

okay thats my touch base story with you all and now i really need a coffee. i dont have much to go by but i am a good sketcher it helps me remember.
content.summary: Dark disc round-irritating screech noise-flashing lights with strong powerful beam light coming down-watch the grass fade to black-fell asleep inb the pulsating heat of the light as the hovering sound got louder-on metal bed-moving fast-vibrating-dark roo
